mouse_platform.name: Mouse Platform
mouse_platform.notes: Radius is the distance from the center of the wheel to the mouse.

position.device_origin: Located at the center of the screen. Right and left conventions are relative to the screen side of the monitor, ie. from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: X
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center towards the right of the screen, from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: Y
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center towards the top of the screen.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the front of the screen towards the subject

position.notes: The rotation matrix is represented as: a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i. Wherein a, b, c correspond to the first row of the matrix. The translation matrix is represented as: x,y,z.

position.device_origin: Located on the front mounting flange face. Right and left conventions are relative to the front side of the speaker, ie. from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: X
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the speaker towards the right of the speaker, from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: Y
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center towards the top of the speaker.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the speaker towards the subject

position.notes: The rotation matrix is represented as: a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i. Wherein a, b, c correspond to the first row of the matrix. The translation matrix is represented as: x,y,z. Speaker to be mounted with the X axis pointing to the right when viewing the speaker along the Z axis

reward_spouts.name: Reward Spout
reward_spouts.notes: Spout diameter is for inner diameter. Outer diameter is 1.575mm.

camera.name: Forward camera
camera.notes: Max frame rate is at maximum resolution.

position.device_origin: Located on the face of the lens mounting surface at its center, ie. just ahead of the camera sensor

device_axes.name: X
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the left of the assembly, from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: Y
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the bottom of the assembly.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the sensor towards the subject

position.notes: The rotation matrix is represented as: a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i. Wherein a, b, c correspond to the first row of the matrix. The translation matrix is represented as: x,y,z.

camera.name: Side camera
camera.notes: Max frame rate is at maximum resolution.

position.device_origin: Located on the face of the lens mounting surface at its center, ie. just ahead of the camera sensor

device_axes.name: X
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the left of the assembly, from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: Y
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the bottom of the assembly.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the sensor towards the subject

position.notes: The rotation matrix is represented as: a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i. Wherein a, b, c correspond to the first row of the matrix. The translation matrix is represented as: x,y,z.

camera.name: Eye camera
camera.notes: Max frame rate is at maximum resolution.

position.device_origin: Located on the face of the lens mounting surface at its center, ie. just ahead of the camera sensor

device_axes.name: X
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the left of the assembly, from the subject's perspective.

device_axes.name: Y
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the center of the sensor towards the bottom of the assembly.

device_axes.name: Z
device_axes.direction: Positive is from the sensor towards the subject

position.notes: The rotation matrix is represented as: a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i. Wherein a, b, c correspond to the first row of the matrix. The translation matrix is represented as: x,y,z.

patch_cords.name: Patch Cord #1
patch_cords.notes: Numerical aperture is approximately between 0.10 and 0.14.

calibrations.description: sound_volume = log(1 - ((dB - c) / a)) / b;dB is sound pressure
solenoid open time (ms) = slope * expected water volume (mL) + intercept
calibrations.notes: Calibration date is a placeholder. If intercept and slope are 0, their requisite values are missing but solenoid open time should still be accurate.

rig_axes.name: X
rig_axes.direction: The world horizontal. Lays on the Mouse Sagittal Plane. Positive direction is towards the nose of the mouse.

rig_axes.name: Y
rig_axes.direction: Perpendicular to Y. Positive direction is away from the nose of the mouse.
